scripts.dev: pnpm run build:api && pnpm run setup:dev && pnpm run generate:manifest && vite dev --port 3000
scripts.build: pnpm run build:api && pnpm run generate:manifest && pnpm run build:site && pnpm run copy:api && pnpm run build:search
scripts.build:api: pnpm run clean:api && pnpm run typedoc
scripts.copy:api: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(fs.existsSync('dist/api')&&fs.existsSync('dist/client')){const src='dist/api';const dest='dist/client/typedoc';fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});console.log('API docs copied to dist/client/typedoc');}else{console.log('Missing dist/api or dist/client, skipping API copy');}"
scripts.setup:dev: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(fs.existsSync('dist/api')){const src='dist/api';const dest='public/typedoc';fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});console.log('API docs linked for development');}else{console.log('No dist/api found for development setup');}"
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:api && pnpm run clean:build && pnpm run clean:dev
scripts.check: pnpm run check:api-parity && pnpm run check:doc-imports && pnpm run check:nav && pnpm run check:links && pnpm run check:examples && pnpm run check:api
